actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-382, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3064 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Bill is closed to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 131.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 330.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 202 (Roll no. 503).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3064) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3064 (District of Columbia appropriations).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3064) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.
